Articles.Content:
Whenever you test your rover at Kerbin surface, and press the 'W'/'S' (Forward), and notice that it slide a little bit left or right while speed up? And if you press (Forward) all the way, and "Alt+." force physical warp x4, It will definitely going flip and "kaboom".

Well, with this car, you can warp4x-full-speed-circle-turning and it remain intact. (However it does slide a little bit at 4x)

Note: It is not flip proof, You will still go "kaboom" if you hit the bumper (Uneven surface).

Perhaps, you could learn a few tricks on how this work.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Important:- Toggle SAS "ON" then "OFF" for safe-driving. (Remain OFF while driving.)

Press '1' for Science!

Press '2' toggle Mystery Goo Cover.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Download Link

Rover at full speed, and FULL-turning in circle 4X. Yet, remain intact (on) ground.

Adding detail.
